author: Ingrid Lunden
title: SMB loans platform Kabbage to furlough a ‘significant’ number of staff, close office in Bangalore
description: Another tech unicorn is feeling the pinch of doing business during the coronavirus pandemic. Today, Kabbage, the Softbank-backed lending startup that uses machine learning to provide speedy and more accurate evaluations of loan applications for small and medi…
